| HistoryText             = The Hellfire Knights are used as security for the Inner Circle of the [[Hellfire Club (Earth-616)|Hellfire Club]].

They were tasked to take down the [[X-Men (Earth-616)|X-Men]] and failed, but their failure was quickly forgotten with the intervention of the [[Emma Frost (Earth-616)|White Queen]] who defeated the X-Men using her powerful telepathic powers.{{r|X-Men #129}}

Later, they were tasked to capture the mutant artist [[Alison Blaire (Earth-616)|Dazzler]], as she was wanted by the X-Men too, but were beaten by her and the time-travelling [[Anthony Stark (Earth-81191)|Iron Man]].{{r|Iron Age #3}}
